thread.title: Samsung Z3 Tizen-based smartphone launched in India, priced at Rs 8,490: Specifications, features
thread.title_full: Samsung Z3 Tizen-based smartphone launched in India, priced at Rs 8,490: Specifications, features - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Samsung Z3 Tizen-based smartphone launched in India, priced at Rs 8,490: Specifications, features
text: Samsung launched its Tizen-powered Z1 in India, earlier this year with a price tag of Rs 5,700. Today at an event, the South Korea n giant launched its second Tizen smartphone, the Z3. The Samsung Z3 is priced at Rs 8,490, and will be exclusively available via Snapdeal from October 21 onwards. The smartphone will be available in gold, black and silver color variants. As an introductory offer, Vodafone buyers will get 1GB of free data per month for a period of two months. Samsung Z3 specifications and features: The smartphone flaunts a 5-inch HD (1280×720 pixels) Super AMOLED display, and is powered by a 1.3GHz Spreadtrum quad-core processor paired with 1GB of RAM. Also on offer is 8GB internal storage, »
